segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to go to Europe for a visit ? Can you recommend me an interesting city ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not go to Paris ? It's famous for Arch of Triumph , Eiffel , versailles and place de la Concorde .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a package tour to Paris ?
segments.speaker: S2
